column2: Destroy this title outright. CAUTION: Makes no attempt to "fix" vassalage under the title, if any.
Gain all unowned settlements under the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!.
Force §Y[Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§! to me.
Log this title's currently readable, regular-type succession law, if any, to game.log.

Reduce all of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s playable vassals' opinion of [Root.GetHerHim] by §R-25§! for §Y3§! years. This only affects patricians or count- or higher-tier vassals-- not vassal barons from [Root.GetHerHis] demesne.
Make the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! the primary title of §Y[Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!.

Increase all of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s playable vassals' opinion of [Root.GetHerHim] by §G25§! for §Y3§! years. This only affects patricians or count- or higher-tier vassals-- not vassal barons from [Root.GetHerHis] demesne.
Usurp all held titles of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. However, landless titles will NOT be usurped, so characters with landless titles will still be rulers afterward.
Usurp or, if necessary, create the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!.
Has at least one playable vassal\n
